import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom' import NavBar from './NavBar' import Home from './Home' import FindGame from './FindGame' import FindPlayer from './FindPlayer' import Login from './Login' function App() { const [allTeams, setAllTeams] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:3000/teams") .then(r => r.json()) .then(teams => setAllTeams(teams)) }, [setAllTeams]) const findAPlayer = (request) => { const configObj = { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", Accept: "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(request) } fetch("http://localhost:3000/teams", configObj) .then(r => r.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data) setAllTeams([...allTeams, request]) }) } return (
) } export default App
